GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
regulator: qcom_rpm: Fix circular deferral regression

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 7ad3a049a476a91f23b771a1092115ed1baf23b8, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 087a1b5cdd555970feb8a340dc008b6914f05128. For more details please see the references link.
